Sql.query: INSERT INTO rer_calculo_anual ( rercacodi, reravcodi, emprcodi, equicodi, rercaippi, rercaippo, rercataradjbase, rercafaccorreccion, rercafacactanterior, rercafacactualizacion, rercataradj, rercacomment, rercausucreacion, rercafeccreacion ) VALUES ( :rercacodi, :reravcodi, :emprcodi, :equicodi, :rercaippi, :rercaippo, :rercataradjbase, :rercafaccorreccion, :rercafacactanterior, :rercafacactualizacion, :rercataradj, :rercacomment, :rercausucreacion, :rercafeccreacion )

UPDATE rer_calculo_anual SET rercacodi = :rercacodi, emprcodi = :emprcodi, equicodi = :equicodi, reravcodi = :reravcodi, rercaippi = :rercaippi, rercaippo = :rercaippo, rercataradjbase = :rercataradjbase, rercafaccorreccion = :rercafaccorreccion, rercafacactanterior = :rercafacactanterior, rercafacactualizacion = :rercafacactualizacion, rercataradj = :rercataradj, rercacomment = :rercacomment, rercausucreacion = :rercausucreacion, rercafeccreacion = :rercafeccreacion WHERE rercacodi = :rercacodi

SELECT rercacodi, emprcodi, equicodi, reravcodi, rercaippi, rercaippo, rercataradjbase, rercafaccorreccion, rercafacactanterior, rercafacactualizacion, rercataradj, rercacomment, rercausucreacion, rercafeccreacion FROM rer_calculo_anual ORDER BY rercacodi ASC

SELECT rercacodi, emprcodi, equicodi, reravcodi, rercaippi, rercaippo, rercataradjbase, rercafaccorreccion, rercafacactanterior, rercafacactualizacion, rercataradj, rercacomment, rercausucreacion, rercafeccreacion FROM rer_calculo_anual WHERE rercacodi = :rercacodi

SELECT rercacodi, emprcodi, equicodi, reravcodi, rercaippi, rercaippo, rercataradjbase, rercafaccorreccion, rercafacactanterior, rercafacactualizacion, rercataradj, rercacomment, rercausucreacion, rercafeccreacion FROM rer_calculo_anual where (-1 = {0} or rercacodi = {0})

SELECT emp.emprnomb, eq.equinomb, av.reravaniotarif, av.reravversion, ca.* FROM rer_anioversion av, rer_calculo_anual ca inner join eq_equipo eq on eq.equicodi = ca.equicodi and eq.emprcodi = ca.emprcodi inner join si_empresa emp on emp.emprcodi = ca.emprcodi where ({0} is null or av.reravversion = '{0}') and (-1 = {1} or av.reravaniotarif = {1}) and ca.reravcodi = av.reravcodi order by emp.emprnomb, eq.equinomb
